message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which has been meticulously crafted to provide exceptional value. It's worth more than $80 to us, but I'm willing to start our negotiation at $100. This is a high-quality item that could be perfect for your needs. What do you think?
I appreciate the offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $80. I've done some research and I think that's a fair price for the product. Can you meet me at $80?
